pinyin: wǒ zǒng shì jiě jué wǒ de wèn tí

english: I'll solve it in a moment
chinese: 我一会儿就解决这个问题
pinyin: wǒ yī huì er jiù jiě jué zhè ge wèn tí
portuguese: Vou resolver isso em um momento

pinyin: nǐ rú hé jiě jué chōng tū

chinese: 你很快就能解决所有问题
pinyin: nǐ hěn kuài jiù néng jiě jué suǒ yǒu wèn tí
tā jiě jué le yī qiè
shí jiān néng jiě jué yī qiè

chinese: 我们一起解决任何问题
pinyin: wǒ men yì qǐ jiě jué rèn hé wèn tí
wǒ men yì qǐ jiě jué
nǐ jiě jué dé hěn hǎo
tā men dú zì jiě jué le
tōng guò jiāo tán jiě jué

english: This needs to be resolved soon
chinese: 这个问题需要尽快解决
pinyin: zhè ge wèn tí xū yào jǐn kuài jiě jué

english: you have to solve the problem
pinyin: wèn tí bì xū jiě jué

english: you have to clear the path
pinyin: bì xū qīng chú lù jìng
